title: Remco Evenepoel Calls Out UAE Tactics, Luke Plapp Takes Over Yellow at Paris-Nice
content:
Brandon McNulty defends podium spot behind stage-winner Santiago Buitrago and Aussie Plapp in hard-fought, but deflated summit finale.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Calls Out UAE Tactics, Luke Plapp Takes Over Yellow at Paris-Nice on Velo.
author: ahood
